column4: where can i get the dockbarx deb package i no its out there i used it before
what version of ubuntu are you on
i cant get the first command $mkdir -p ~/SVN/Dockbar to work
yes. it has instructions under "Adding this PPA to your system"
alright. gl. thanks for using ubuntu.
you meen thanks for loving ubuntu

What you want to do is first go to system > preferences > theme. Then open up the folder you downloaded the tar.gz theme archive to. To install the theme just drag and drop the tar.gz file from the file manager to the theme preferences window and that should install it for you. Hope that helped
